name: Meet Disney Characters
description: What could be more fun than meeting your favorite Disney character in person? Minnie and Mickey Mouse have residences in Disneyland's Toontown.

name: Frozen Show
description: Disneyland and California Adventure have some great live shows featuring singing, dancing, and sometimes a little audience participation.

name: Watch Parade
description: In most places, you're lucky to see one parade a year, but at Disneyland, you can watch two or three in a single day.

name: Watch the Fireworks
description: Disneyland has fireworks about 250 times a year, and they're some of the best you'll see anywhere. They're launched using low-smoke.

name: Skyline Tour
description: The Skyline, and Skyline Twilight tour visits the more modern gathering spaces of DTLA.

name: Fantasmic!
description: Fantasmic! is a combination of live action and projected Disney images and movie clips on a mist screen.
